src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? # request ( food ) ; request ( cafe ( air_conditioning ) ) ARI : Yes . Of course . # affirm ( ) ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . # inform ( food ) LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? # request ( food ( menu ) ) RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . # disaffirm ( ) [start] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate . [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? Right , left , straight ahead ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Okay , thank you . [MASK] RC : Um also ... [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? Are there set opening hours ? [MASK] ARI : It 's at 11 o'clock . [MASK] RC : Ah , it opens at 11 o'clock ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : And what time does it close ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's a shame , thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there ... [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there a lift to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] RC : Um no , because it 's on the ground floor . [MASK] LP : Oh ok. [MASK] RC : But could you please tell us where the lifts are ? Where at the entrance are they located ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Um for the lifts ? ARI : Yes . [MASK] [end] RC : You already told me this for the cafeteria . So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . Have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: LC : Hello . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? [MASK] RP : Yes . [MASK] RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] [end] LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . # offer-help ( ) LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )
tgt: LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) RP : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( room_17 ) ) LC : Thank you . # thank ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . # inform ( appt ( general_info ) ) RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? # thank ( ) ; change-volume ( turn_up ) ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Hello , I 'd like to know where my doctor 's office is ? I have an appointment with her at 3 PM . # greet ( ) ; request ( doctor ( room ) ) RC : Do you have an appointment at 3 PM ? [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . [MASK] RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? [MASK] ARI : Do you need information ? [MASK] RC : Well , we 'd just like to know where we can get a hot chocolate . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : Ah , yes . [MASK] [end] ARI : You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . # inform ( food ) ; inform ( drink ) RC : Ah , that 's good , we 'll go there . We have time before the appointment . # acknowledge ( )

RC : So where can we get a coffee ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? # r-repet ( ) ARI : Do you need information ? # offer-help ( ) RC : Well , we 'd just like to know where we can get a hot chocolate . # request ( beverage ( hot_chocolate ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) RC : Ah , yes . # acknowledge ( )

src: LC : Well , the treatment was , well the appointment was very quick . I 'd love a coffee now . Do you know where I could get one ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) [start] RP : Um hello , we 'd like a coffee . Can you please tell us where to go to get a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , well thank you very much . [MASK] LC : So we 'll take the lift back down , is that right ? [MASK] RP : Do you have to take the lift to go back down ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . [MASK] RP : Can you tell us where the lift is ? [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lifts ) )
tgt: RP : Um hello , we 'd like a coffee . Can you please tell us where to go to get a coffee ? # greet ( ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( cafe ) ) RP : Ok , well thank you very much . # acknowledge ( ) ; thank ( ) LC : So we 'll take the lift back down , is that right ? # suggest ( going-to ( ground_floor ) ) RP : Do you have to take the lift to go back down ? # request ( directions ( ground_floor ) ) ARI : Yes , of course . # affirm ( ) RP : Can you tell us where the lift is ? # request ( location ( lifts ) )

src: LC : I 'd prefer a hot chocolate . # request ( beverage ( hot_chocolate ) ) RP : And why not herbal tea ? # suggest ( requesting ( beverage ( herbal_tea ) ) ) LC : Well , yes . # accept-sugg ( requesting ( beverage ( herbal_tea ) ) ) [start] RP : To de-stress . [MASK] RP : Could we have a hot drink to relax a bit ? We 're a little bit annoyed , stressed out from all of this . The hospital is complicated , is n't it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , there 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] RP : Well , great , thank you . [MASK] LC : I see a sign , but I do n't know what it means . RP : Ah . LC : Is it a round trip ? RP : Ah , ah , yes . RP : How do we get to the ground floor , do we take the lift ? How do we do it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , the lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] RP : Ah great , thank you . [MASK] [end] RP : Goodbye . # bye ( ) ARI : You 're welcome . RP : We do n't need you anymore , goodbye . # bye ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # bye ( ) RP : Great , well , we 're done .
tgt: RP : To de-stress . # suggest ( requesting ( beverage ( herbal_tea ) ) ) RP : Could we have a hot drink to relax a bit ? We 're a little bit annoyed , stressed out from all of this . The hospital is complicated , is n't it ? # request ( beverage ( hot_drink ) ) ARI : Yes , there 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . # affirm ( ) ; inform ( location ( cafe ) ) , inform ( beverage ( hot_drink ) ) RP : Well , great , thank you . # thank ( ) LC : I see a sign , but I do n't know what it means . RP : Ah . LC : Is it a round trip ? RP : Ah , ah , yes . RP : How do we get to the ground floor , do we take the lift ? How do we do it ? # request ( directions ( ground_floor ) ) ARI : Yes , the lifts are at the entrance on the left . # affirm ( ) ; inform ( directions ( ground_floor ) ) RP : Ah great , thank you . # thank ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? [MASK] LP : I think ... [MASK] LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? [MASK] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : And how do we get there ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Ok. [MASK] RC : Before we go to the cafeteria , I 'd like to go to the toilet . Where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] RC : So what do we do , shall we go ? [MASK] [end] LP : I really need to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : I did n't understand your request , could you rephrase it ? # r-paraph ( request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : How can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) RC : We would like to go to the toilets . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) LP : Could you please come with me to the toilets ? # request ( guide-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LP : I would like to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) )
